paragraphs.normal1: We believe in shared humanistic values and act with a `hand-in-hand and heart-to-heart` attitude. We know that what is freely given will return, and what is coming back once was truly and selflessly gifted. As so, we create an open space format for sharing academic goods and tools to help those in need be sufficiently provided with all necessary technical and office materials.
paragraphs.normal2: If you feel the internal impulse and would like to donate, please contact the Head of Academic Garage Project - Volodymyr.kyrylov@usi.ch
